mapper.insert: insert into user (ID, name, school, institute, major, class, number, role, phone, password, createTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{class,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
institute = #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class = #{class,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, institute = #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class = #{class,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, name, school, institute, major, class, number, role, phone, password, createTime from user where phone=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT ID, name, school, institute, major, class, number, role, phone, password, createTime FROM `user`WHERE `user`.ID=(SELECT lesson_member.userID FROM lesson_member WHERE lesson_member.id=#{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
